Package net.sourceforge.JDash.ecu.comm

Interface Summary
ECUMonitor An ECU Monitor represents the methos required by the main applicaiton to communicate with the ECU.
MonitorEventListener This interface is defines events fired by a monitor during it's processing life.
 

Class Summary
BaseMonitor All monitors should really extend this class.
ELMScanMonitor If you have an ELMScan module from ScanTool.net, then this is the monitor for you.
InitListener When the init method on a monitor is called, an instance of this class can be passed to it.
KWP2000Monitor This is a KWP2000 Capable monitor.
MonitorEventListener.MonitorEventAdapter don't need all themethod of the event listener..
NissanConsultMonitor This is a Nissan Consult capable monitor.
RS232Monitor If your concrete monitor uses some sort of serial rs232 protocol, then you'll likely want to extend this monitor.
RS232Packet This montior acts on it's version of the RS232 protocol.
SSMOBD1Monitor This extension to the SSMMonitor is setup to use the OBD-II version of SSM
SSMOBD2Monitor This extension to the SSMMonitor is setup to use the OBD-II version of SSM * http://scoobypedia.co.uk/index.php/Knowledge/ReadingAndReflashingECUs http://www.scoobypedia.co.uk/index.php/Knowledge/ECUVersionCompatibilityList#toc3 http://www.enginuity.org/search.php?search_id=1844875639&start=105 http://www.vwrx.com/index.php?pg=selectmonitor
TestMonitor This monitor will get each ECUParameter from the registry, and increment it's value every DELAY ms.
